entry.string: Are you sure you want to delete category '#(1)'?
entry.translation: Er du sikker p√• at du vil slette kategorien '#(1)'?

entry.string: This category has #(1) sub-categories and #(2) module items assigned to them.
entry.translation: Denne kategori har #(1) underkategori(er) og er tildelt #(2) modulpunkter.
